document_data.name: ''Potion of Agility''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potions of agility''''' were a type of [[potion]].
document_data.Powers: This potion temporarily increased the imbiber's dexterity.
document_data.Notable Owners:
*[[Min Minling]], a merchant from the village of [[Imnesvale (town)|Imnesvale]] in the [[Umar Hills]] ''circa'' [[1368 DR]].
*[[Oswald Fiddlebender]] carried a selection of home-made potions, including ''potions of agility'', during his time in [[Kuldahar]] ''circa'' [[1281 DR]], and later in [[Targos]] of the [[Ten-Towns]] ''circa'' [[1312 DR]].
